title: 输入fly提示已开启但是没法飞，创造可以飞。
author: a131313pp
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a131313pp 于 2020-3-20 09:42 编辑 

这是插件列表,一个一个排查了一下好像并没有类似的反作弊插件。多世界插件的allowflight已经调成了true,请问还有可能是什么问题。服务器版本是This server is running KCauldron version 1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT (MC: 1.7.10) (Implementing API version 1.7.10-R0.1-SNAPSHOT)
Plugins (67):PlaceholderAPI, GroupManager, tpLogin, BetterLottery2, AsyncKeepAlive, CashCode, RandomPlacer, Guibind, BanItem, TcGolemBug, AT, LWCField, AntiCraft, FixCaseSentiveBugs, AntiBoneDustBug, CoreProtect, BanAdvsunGuiReload, WorldEdit, FrameProtect, Skript, WorldManager, NOWorldCommand, OpenInv, Essentials, SlashFixer, Chat, RestartAnnounce, AudioBuffer, FixArcaneWorkbench, GeneralDataCoreV4, ProtocolLib, AutoSaveWorld, Notbuild, EasyKits, EssentialsChat, RepairASP, CommandCode, AntiCrucibleBug, UltimateGuild, Levels, Vault, Lores, GUIQD, ScriptBlock, NeverLag, LWC, QuickShop, PlayerPoints, ItemLoreStats, ChestCommands, EssentialsProtect, EssentialsAntiBuild, EssentialsSpawn, PlotMe, MCLib, ColorMOTD, Multiverse-Core, GreatFireWall, LWCAutoLock, Residence,GlobalMarket, AncientGates, McPay, AuthMe, HolographicDisplays, RPG_Items

replies.author: Kruls
replies.txt_content: 除了是op以外,还要在server.properties文件设置 allow-flight=true 默认是false,要改.

replies.author: 酥宁最酥啦
replies.txt_content: 插件列表，发一下，也可以尝试楼上的操作

replies.author: a131313pp
replies.txt_content:
Kruls 发表于 2020-3-20 10:00
除了是op以外,还要在server.properties文件设置 allow-flight=true 默认是false,要改.
确实是这个问题，没想到server.properties里面还有个限制。一直在插件里面找怪不得找不到
